wikitext.*:
滑動門效果，電腦端為鼠標滑過時打開，而移動端是點擊後打開。 ==用法== 
{{Sliding Doors
|width=
|float=
|lgstyle=
|lg=
|rgstyle=
|rg=
|content=
}}
== 參數 == *顯示內容 *width=　，整個滑動門的寬度 *float=　，浮動效果，可填left、right等，默認為不浮動。 *lgstyle= ，左側滑動門的樣式 *rgstyle= ，右側滑動門的樣式 *lg= ，左側滑動門的內容 *rg= ，右側滑動門的內容 *content= ，滑動門背後的內容。 == 例子 == {{Sliding Doors |width=320px |content=
[[File:58984528 p1.png|300px]]
}} {{Sliding Doors|width=320px |content=
[[File:58984528 p1.png|300px]]
}} == 例子 == {{Sliding Doors |width=800px |float=left |lgstyle=background: -prefix-linear-gradient(left, #ebf5ff, #b1d8ff, #89c4ff);background: linear-gradient(to right, #ebf5ff, #b1d8ff, #89c4ff) |rgstyle=background: -prefix-linear-gradient(left, #89c4ff, #b1d8ff, #ebf5ff);background: linear-gradient(to right, #89c4ff, #b1d8ff, #ebf5ff) |content=[[File:39299502_p0_master1200.jpg|400px]][[File:39299502_p1_master1200.jpg|400px]]
しゃび的作品
}} {{Sliding Doors |width=800px |float=left |lgstyle=background: -prefix-linear-gradient(left, #ebf5ff, #b1d8ff, #89c4ff);background: linear-gradient(to right, #ebf5ff, #b1d8ff, #89c4ff) |rgstyle=background: -prefix-linear-gradient(left, #89c4ff, #b1d8ff, #ebf5ff);background: linear-gradient(to right, #89c4ff, #b1d8ff, #ebf5ff) |content=[[File:39299502_p0_master1200.jpg|400px]][[File:39299502_p1_master1200.jpg|400px]]
しゃび的作品
}} {{-}} == 例子 == {{Sliding Doors |width=300px |float=left |lgstyle=background: radial-gradient(circle farthest-corner at center center , #FFE700 10%, #FFC500 50%, #FFA500) |rgstyle=background: radial-gradient(circle farthest-corner at center center , #FFE700 10%, #FFC500 50%, #FFA500) |content=[[File:37740510_p0.jpg|300px]]
